      1. Regression references

      Vignette Author

      2018-11-27

      r-regression_references.Rmd

      Boldina & Beninger. 2016. Strengthening statistical usage in marine ecology: Linear regression. Journal of Experimental Marine Biology & Ecology

      Marril. 2004. Advanced Statistics: Linear Regression, Part I: Simple Linear Regression. Emergency Medicine

      Marril 2008. Advanced Statistics: Linear Regression, Part II: Multiple Linear Regression. Emergency Medicine Schneider et al 2010. Linear regression analysis: part 14 of a series on evaluation of scientific publications. Deutsches Ärzteblatt.

      Misc

      GINGERICH. 2000. Arithmetic or Geometric Normality of Biological Variation: an Empirical Test of Theory. Journal of Theoretical Biology

      Flewelling and Pienaar. 1981. Multiplicative Regression with Lognormal Errors. Forest Science.

      Beauchamp & Olson. 1973. Corrections for Bias in Regression Estimates After Logarithmic Transformation. Ecology.

      Hayes & Shonkwiler. 2006. Allometry, antilog transformations, and the perils of prediction on the original scale. Physiological and Biochemical Zoology.

      Laws & Atrchie. 1981. Appropriate use of regression analysis in marine biology. Marine Biology

      McArdle. 2003. Lines, models, and errors: regression in the field. Limnology and Oceanography

      Developed by First Last.
